info.title: InfoQuery
info.description: InfoQuery allows you to automate your business by leveraging your Resware data in a low-code solution. You can view, create, delete and update files, documents, partners, etc.

post.summary: Add New Partner Employee To Partner Company
post.description: Adds a new partner employee to a partner company.

get.summary: Get Transaction And Product Types For Estimation And Order Placement
get.description: Get transaction types and product types for fee estimation and placing orders.

put.description: Updates an action for a given file. Can update the Action Group ID and start/complete Coordinator Type ID, Partner Type ID, Due Date, Due Date Locked and Done Date Locked. This API call cannot be used to mark an action as started or completed.

post.summary: Gets Files From Given Search Criteria
post.description: Gets a list of files and their information based on the given search criteria.

delete.description: Removes a partner from the specified file.

get.description: Gets information on a partner with the specified ID.

post.summary: Create New Document On Specific File
post.description: Creates a new document on the specified file.

post.summary: Add Or Update Custom Field On Specific File
post.description: Adds or updates custom fields on the specified file.
Adds a partner to the specified file.

put.summary: Update Partner Information For Specific File
put.description: Updates the partner information on the specified file.

post.description: Adds a new note to the specified file.

get.description: Gets a list of partners and their information on the specified file.

post.summary: Upload Web URL Document To Specific File
post.description: Loads the Web URL document on the specified file.

post.summary: Add Or Update Custom Field On Specific Document
post.description: Adds or updates custom fields on the specified document on the specified file.

put.description: Updates the information of a partner employee.

get.description: Gets a list of the parties and their information on the specified file.
Gets a list of the notes on the specified file.
Gets the note with the specified ID.

post.description: Adds an action to the specified file.

get.summary: Get Custom Fields On Specific Document
get.description: Get the custom fields on the specified document.
Gets all information regarding the documents on the specified file.
Gets information on a document with the specified ID.

get.summary: Get Custom Fields For Specific File
get.description: Gets the custom fields for the specified file.
Gets the closing fee estimate receipt.

get.summary: Get Closing Fee Estimate Receipt PDF
get.description: Gets the closing fee estimate receipt in the pdf format.
Gets all the actions on the specified file.
Gets the information on the currently connected user.
